SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 as row_num , l.no as grp_lec_no , l.category as grp_lec_category , l.title as grp_lec_title , lecture.tempTeacherName as grp_user_teacherName , lecture.loginID as grp_user_teacherID , DATE_FORMAT(l.startdate, '%Y-%m-%d') as grp_lec_startDate , DATE_FORMAT(l.enddate, '%Y-%m-%d') as grp_lec_endDate , ROUND(avg(cast(s.survey as unsigned)), 1) as grp_surveyAvg , count(*) as grp_surveyCount FROM tb_survey as s INNER JOIN tb_lecture as l ON s.no = l.no LEFT JOIN ( SELECT le.no as no, ui.name as tempTeacherName, ui.loginID FROM tb_lecture as le INNER JOIN tb_userinfo as ui ON le.loginID = ui.loginID GROUP BY le.no ) as lecture ON l.no = lecture.no
WHERE (@rownum:=0)=0
AND lecture.tempTeacherName like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND l.title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
GROUP BY l.no
